headline: Show HN: GreetPool – an easy platform to create and share group cards with teams
description:
Hi Everyone,

Very happy and excited to Show HN GreetPool,

GreetPool is a collaborative group greeting card platform that enables distributed teams, friends, family, or virtual communities to create and share collective ecards for all special occasions. Its the digital twin of the office card that's signed and passed around, but without the coordination hassles, and is much more fun and engaging.

With remote-work/wfh prevalence widening the virtual distances, it is the small gestures that help teams stay connected, and keep the greeting card traditions, & the human connection at workplace, alive.

Test out a Live demo here (no signup or account required)

https://www.greetpool.com/demo

We launched on ProductHunt today, feel free to check that out too.

I would love to hear feedback and comments!

~Jaskirat
